comment: Oh what an exciting life we now lead. The highlight of the day going for a vaccination. A walk up the road and meet anyone of a similar age and the conversation soon turns to 'have you had your vaccination yet'? Damn you .
amr:
# ::snt Oh what an exciting life we now lead. The highlight of the day going for a vaccination. A walk up the road and meet anyone of a similar age and the conversation soon turns to 'have you had your vaccination yet'? Damn you .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (l / life
            :ARG0-of (e / excite-01
                  :degree (s / so))
            :ARG1-of (l2 / lead-02
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :time (n / now)))
      :snt2 (h / highlight-01
            :ARG1 (g / go-02
                  :ARG4 (v / vaccinate-01))
            :time (d / day))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (w2 / walk-01
                        :ARG2 (r / road)
                        :direction (u / up))
                  :op2 (m2 / meet-02
                        :ARG1 (a3 / anyone
                              :age (t / temporal-quantity
                                    :ARG1-of (r2 / resemble-01)
                                    :ARG2-of r2))))
            :op2 (t2 / turn-02
                  :ARG1 (c / converse-01)
                  :ARG2 (h2 / have-03
                        :ARG0 (y / you)
                        :ARG1 (v2 / vaccinate-01
                              :ARG1 y)
                        :time (y2 / yet)
                        :polarity (a4 / amr-unknown))
                  :time (s2 / soon)))
      :snt4 (d2 / damn-01
            :mode expressive
            :ARG1 y))
